class.rdfs:comment: A media object, such as an image, video, or audio object embedded in a web page or a downloadable dataset i.e. DataDownload. Note that a creative work may have many media objects associated with it on the same web page. For example, a page about a single song (MusicRecording) may have a music video (VideoObject), and a high and low bandwidth audio stream (2 AudioObject's).
class.rdfs:label: MediaObject

schema:associatedArticle.rdfs:comment: A NewsArticle associated with the Media Object.
schema:associatedArticle.rdfs:label: associatedArticle

schema:bitrate.rdfs:comment: The bitrate of the media object.
schema:bitrate.rdfs:label: bitrate

schema:contentUrl.rdfs:comment: Actual bytes of the media object, for example the image file or video file.
schema:contentUrl.rdfs:label: contentUrl

schema:duration.rdfs:comment: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in ISO 8601 date format.
schema:duration.rdfs:label: duration

schema:embedUrl.rdfs:comment: A URL pointing to a player for a specific video. In general, this is the information in the src element of an embed tag and should not be the same as the content of the loc tag.
schema:embedUrl.rdfs:label: embedUrl

schema:encodesCreativeWork.rdfs:comment: The CreativeWork encoded by this media object.
schema:encodesCreativeWork.rdfs:label: encodesCreativeWork

schema:playerType.rdfs:comment: Player type required—for example, Flash or Silverlight.
schema:playerType.rdfs:label: playerType

schema:productionCompany.rdfs:comment: The production company or studio responsible for the item e.g. series, video game, episode etc.
schema:productionCompany.rdfs:label: productionCompany

schema:regionsAllowed.rdfs:comment: The regions where the media is allowed. If not specified, then it's assumed to be allowed everywhere. Specify the countries in ISO 3166 format.
schema:regionsAllowed.rdfs:label: regionsAllowed

schema:requiresSubscription.rdfs:comment: Indicates if use of the media require a subscription (either paid or free). Allowed values are true or false (note that an earlier version had 'yes', 'no').
schema:requiresSubscription.rdfs:label: requiresSubscription

schema:uploadDate.rdfs:comment: Date when this media object was uploaded to this site.
schema:uploadDate.rdfs:label: uploadDate
